title: A Light in The Darkness : A Beginners Guide to Wellness
description: 6 years of DBT classes, working in recovery resource centers, performing with the award winning Stars of Light Theater Troupe, speaking and running his own work shop at various conventions. Mike Corey now brings you his self help work book. Based around his own way of dealing with his mental differences such as (BPD) & (PTSD) among many others. This book is ment to help one get control over their worries, fears & anxiety's and to help one gain confidence & control over their lives. Although ment for those living with mental differences it can be used by all so enjoy.
author: Mike A. Corey
